briefTitle: Efficacy Study of Zoledronic Acid and Teriparatide Combination Therapy in Women With Osteoporosis
officialTitle: A One-year Partial Double-blinded, Randomized, Multi-center, Multi-national Study to Assess the Effects of Combination Therapy of Annual Zoledronic Acid (5 mg) and Daily Subcutaneous Teriparatide (2mcrg) on Postmenopausal Women With Severe Osteoporosis
summary: The purpose of this study is to assess the effects of zoledronic acid administered at the same time with teriparatide compared to zoledronic acid alone and teriparatide alone on bone mineral density (BMD) gain in the lumbar spine and total hip

primaryOutcome.measure: Percent Change From Baseline in Lumbar Spine Bone Mineral Density (BMD) at Week 52
